description:
Set yourself up for success when heading out into the cold. Made from lightweight quick-drying material, the Fierce pants keep you warm and dry when pushing yourself on frigid days.

  • Light and stretch poly blend wicks away moisture and dries quickly
  • High waist layers well and adds extra coverage from the cold
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabric adds confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
  • Slim athletic fit layers well
name: Kari Traa Fierce Pants - Women's
